title: Keynote Speech by Ralf Usbeck at Travel Un'chained
text: Ralf Usbeck, CEO of Chain4Travel, gave the opening speech at Travel Un'chained 2022 and began by addressing misconceptions about the world of blockchain and crypto.

title: The Path Forward: El Camino by German Ramirez
text: German is a master of words and expert in emerging technologies like blockchain. With cleverness, he has pointed out the changing customer perceptions in different eras.

title: Blockchain, Way More Than Just Bitcoin by Dr. Stephan Romeike
text: Stephan made it clear that blockchain is much more than just Bitcoin.

title: Payment and Settlement Solutions by Roberto da Re
text: Business-to-business transactions can be expensive, and it can be difficult to reconcile thousands of ledger items across the supply chain. Roberto explains in his keynote speech how Travel Ledger facilitates a solution to this by offering fast and inexpensive settlements for the travel industry.

title: Camino Outlook by Thomas Stirnimann
text: Thomas presented the bright outlook for Camino and ended the afternoon session with a very important and decisive question: 'Which Camino will you take?'

title: Loyalty Programs on Camino by Anke Hsu
text: Anke explained new opportunities for loyalty on Camino. Three key messages can be derived from her keynote speech.
